p: Geographical population structure was evaluated using the Bayesian clustering method implemented in the software STRUCTURE v.2.3 [ 27] for the microsatellite dataset, and the fastSTRUCTURE [ 28] for the SNP dataset. Prior to the implementation of the fastSTRUCTURE analysis, the SNP dataset was filtered to exclude highly linked SNPs, using the --indep-pairwise 50 10 0.3 parameter in PLINK [ 29].
